SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[ImmobiliArea] ( [ImmobiliArea_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [ImmobiliArea_Descrizione] varchar(50) NULL , [ImmobiliArea_UserInsert] int NULL , [ImmobiliArea_UserUpdate] int NULL , [ImmobiliArea_UserDelete] int NULL , [ImmobiliArea_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [ImmobiliArea_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [ImmobiliArea_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[ImmobiliArea] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_ImmobiliArea PRIMARY KEY ([ImmobiliArea_Ky])
